page.title: 13NEWSAGENTS SHOP
page.content: Mr. John Cottingham has been the proprietor of the newsagents shop in Hilton Crescent, West Bridgford since 1970. He employs four part-time helpers to serve in his shop. He opens daily at 5.30 a.m. until 6.0 p.m. On Sundays he closes at 1.0 p.m. On sale are toiletries, confectionary, some dairy products and newspapers. The "Daily Telegraph" and "Daily Express" are the most popular newspapers which his customers buy. Moffats are his wholesale suppliers. Mr. Cottingham loves his job because he meets lots of people.
